title: Updates to the LoL Terms of Use and Privacy Policy
body:
Hey all,

We've recently updated the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy for Oceania. Don't fret! There are no major changes, we've essentially just made it easier to digest with less legal jargon and more LEAGUE jargon. The keyword here is "less", you'll still find some legal jargon, but that's only where it can't be avoided.

Head to the links below to have a look:

Terms of Use: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/legal/termsofuse

Privacy Policy: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/legal/privacy

replies.body: Soon lol. Maybe in about another 5-6yrs when everyone is done and dusted with league thanks to the lack of tribunal.

Eyyy, "The Tribunal®" is now a registered trademark! 

If we translate that from corporate jargon it means "we plan to do something with this soon".

> [{quoted}](name=Tele,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=tVLlpby0,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-01-19T05:20:15.432+0000)
>
> Eyyy, "The Tribunal®" is now a registered trademark! 
> 
> If we translate that from corporate jargon it means "we plan to do something with this soon".

Soon™
